languages.text: These boots grant their wearer +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat for each psy power they use. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: These boots grant their wearer +3% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} until the end of combat for each psy power they use. Stacks.
These boots grant their wearer +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat for each psy power they use. Stacks.
These boots grant their wearer +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat for each psy power they use. Stacks.

languages.text: 装备者每使用一次灵能力量，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}就提高3%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: These boots grant their wearer +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat for each psy power they use. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 装备者每使用一次灵能力量，{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}就提高3%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Сапоги дают +3% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} до конца боя за каждую примененную психосилу. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: These boots grant their wearer +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat for each psy power they use. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Сапоги дают +3% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} до конца боя за каждую примененную психосилу. Эффект суммируется.
Сапоги дают +3% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} до конца боя за каждую примененную психосилу. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 戦闘終了時まで、使用者は自身が使用する超能力に対し{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}+3%を獲得する。この効果は累積する。
languages.original_text: These boots grant their wearer +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat for each psy power they use. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了まで自身が使用する超能力に{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}+3%を付与。この効果は累積する。

languages.text: Estas botas proporcionan a su portador +3 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta el final del combate por cada poder psíquico que use. Es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: These boots grant their wearer +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat for each psy power they use. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Estas botas proporcionan a su portador +3 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} hasta el final del combate por cada poder psíquico que use. Es acumulativo.

languages.text: Diese Stiefel gewähren dem Träger bis zum Ende des Kampfes +3 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} für jede verwendete Psioniker-Kraft. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: These boots grant their wearer +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat for each psy power they use. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Diese Stiefel gewähren dem Träger +3 % {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes für jede verwendete Psioniker-Kraft. Addiert sich.

languages.text: Ces bottes confèrent à leur utilisateur +3 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat chaque fois qu'il a recours à un pouvoir psychique. Cumulable.

languages.text: Bu çizmeler, giyen kişiye kullandığı her ruhsezi gücü için +%3 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değeri kazandırır. Etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
